Member

Class MemberList

  • java.lang.Object
    • Member.MemberList

  • public class MemberList
extends java.lang.Object
    MemberList class is the class that represents the list of all the members registered in TimeBanks website, mainly: The login method which throws two kinds of exceptions UserNotFoundExeption, and FailedLoginException:
    See Also:
    UserNotFoundExeption, FailedLoginException

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemberList()
      a list of accounts existing in timebanks website

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMember(Member m)
      Method addmember gives to the user the possibility to add a donation to the list that is already existing
      void deleteMember(Member m)
      deleteDonation enables the user to delete a donation from the existing list of donations
      boolean login(Member member)
      The login method enables checking whether the login was made successfully or not.
      void modifyMember(Member oldMemb, Member mewMemb)
      this behavior modify attributes of the corresponding member class
      int searchMember(Member member)
      searchMember searches for a specific member between all the existing members
      void sortMember(java.util.Comparator comp)
      Sort the members corresponding to the specification of the user
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method prints out all the existing members
